metadata.title: CVE-2019-17017 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Due to a missing case handling object types, a type confusion vulnerabilitycould occur, resulting in a crash. We presume that with enough effort thatit could be exploited to run arbitrary code. This vulnerability affectsFirefox ESR < 68.4 and Firefox < 72.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
